title: About Me
text:
Data Scientist | Social Impact Researcher | Analytics Specialist
I’m currently pursuing my M.S. in Data Science and Analytics at Georgetown University, where I’m building expertise in areas like statistical computing, climate change data science, and advanced analytics. Before that, I earned a Bachelor of Science in Applied Mathematics with a minor in Business Analytics from Towson University, graduating with honors and multiple awards.

title: About Me
text: Data Scientist | Social Impact Researcher | Analytics Specialist

title: About Me
section: M.S. in Data Science and Analytics

Georgetown University, Washington D.C.

Related Coursework: Data Science and Analytics, Probability Modeling/Statistical Computing, Data Science and Climate Change
Participated in the DataKind D.C. Hackathon, extracted unstructured paragraph data and transformed it into organized data frames using Python

title: About Me
section: Bachelor of Science in Applied Mathematics, Minor in Business Analytics
text:
Bachelor of Science in Applied Mathematics, Minor in Business Analytics
Towson University, Towson, MD
May 2024

3.7/4.0 GPA, Dean’s List and Tiger Scholarship Recipient
Departmental honors, Mary Hudson Scarborough Award for Excellence in Mathematics
Data Coordinator, Director of Finance on Executive Board for Alpha Omicron Pi Sorority
Winner of the 2023 (1st place) and 2024 (3rd place) Towson University Data Analytics Competition
